TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ScriptMethodAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ScriptMethodAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ScriptMethodAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定要用來叫用方法的 HTTP 動詞命令 (Verb)，以及回應的格式。

span.span: Specifies which HTTP verb is used to invoke a method, and the format of the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性用來指定可以從用戶端指令碼呼叫的方法資訊。This attribute is used to specify information for methods that can be called from client script. 屬性可讓您指定哪些 HTTP 動詞命令 （GET 或 POST） 可以用來叫用方法。The attribute lets you specify which HTTP verb (GET or POST) can be used to invoke a method. 它也可讓您指定是否使用 JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) 或 XML 格式化回應。It also lets you specify whether the response is formatted by using either JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) or XML. 屬性是選擇性的。The attribute is optional. (不過，可以從用戶端指令碼呼叫的方法必須有套用的屬性。)。(However, methods that can be called from client script must have the attribute applied.). 如果方法未標示為、 使用 HTTP POST 命令也會呼叫的方法和回應會序列化為 JSON。If a method is not marked with , the method will be called by using the HTTP POST command and the response will be serialized as JSON. 您無法覆寫這項設定指令碼。You cannot override this setting from script. 會採用只有具名參數。 takes only named parameters. 以下是屬性可用來當做具名參數的類別：The following are the properties of the class that can be used as named parameters: - 指定使用 HTTP GET 命令是否會叫用此方法。Specifies whether the method will be invoked by using the HTTP GET command. 預設值為 `false`。The default is `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 設定屬性`true`可能會造成安全性風險，您的應用程式，如果您正在使用機密資料或交易。Setting the property to `true` might pose a security risk for your application if you are working with sensitive data or transactions. 在 GET 要求訊息由瀏覽器編碼成 URL，因此遭到竄改的輕鬆目標。In GET requests, the message is encoded by the browser into the URL and is therefore an easier target for tampering. GET 和 POST 要求，您應該遵循安全性指導方針來保護機密資料。For both GET and POST requests, you should follow security guidelines to protect sensitive data. - 指定是否將回應序列化為 JSON 或 XML。Specifies whether the response will be serialized as JSON or as XML. 預設值為 `Json`。The default is `Json`. 屬性可用於 XML 指定為傳回型別，方法傳回時或物件。The property is useful to specify XML as the return type when the method returns an or an object. - 指定是否要將所有的傳回型別，包括字串型別序列化為 XML。Specifies whether all return types, including string types, are serialized as XML. 值回應序列化為 JSON 時，則會忽略屬性。The value of the property is ignored when the response is serialized as JSON. 如需如何使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about how to use attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何套用至`GetXmlDocument`和`EchoStringAndDate`方法，以指定要使用，並指定回應格式的 HTTP 動詞命令。The following example shows how to apply to the `GetXmlDocument` and `EchoStringAndDate` methods to specify which HTTP verb to use and to specify the response format.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Script::Services::ResponseFormat ResponseFormat { System::Web::Script::Services::ResponseFormat get(); void set(System::Web::Script::Services::ResponseFormat value); };
member this.ResponseFormat : System.Web.Script.Services.ResponseFormat with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定方法回應的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the format of the method response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，當您想要指定 XML 做為傳回類型的格式。Use the property when you want to specify XML as the format for the return type. 方法傳回時這非常有用或物件。This is useful when the method returns an or an object. 當屬性設定為`Xml`，公用欄位和屬性的傳回型別具有套用屬性不會忽略。When the property is set to `Xml`, the public fields and properties of the return type that have the attribute applied will not be ignored. 這是因為它們會序列化使用物件而非物件。This is because they will be serialized by using the object instead of the object. 您必須先套用屬性，而讓略過，或略過，這些公用的欄位和屬性的傳回型別。You must apply the attribute to make ignore, or skip, those public fields and properties of the return type. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何套用Web 方法與屬性屬性設定為`Xml`。The following example shows how to apply the attribute to a Web method with the property set to `Xml`. 方法的傳回值會序列化為 XML，並傳送成功的回呼函式物件類型的形式。The return value of the method will be serialized as XML and sent to the succeeded callback function as an object of type . 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseHttpGet { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseHttpGet : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否使用 HTTP GET 叫用方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to invoke the method by using HTTP GET.

value.span: 如果使用 HTTP GET 命令叫用方法則為 ，使用 HTTP POST 命令叫用方法則為 。

span.span: if the method is invoked by using the HTTP GET command; if the method is invoked by using the HTTP POST command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您無法覆寫來自 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 用戶端上的這個屬性。You cannot override this property from ECMAScript (JavaScript) on the client. 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，叫用指令碼的方法一律會使用 HTTP GET。If this property is set to `true`, invoking the method from script will always use HTTP GET. 當這個屬性設定為`true`，用戶端 proxy 程式碼會使用 HTTP GET 呼叫 Web 服務。When this property is set to `true`, the client proxy code uses HTTP GET to call the Web service. 方法的每個輸入的參數會顯示為用來叫用 Web 方法的 URL 中的查詢參數。Each input parameter for the method appears as a query parameter in the URL that is used to invoke the Web method. 取得參數值透過 JavaScript 物件標記法 (JSON) 序列化和 URL 編碼的參數值。The parameter value is obtained through JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) serialization and URL encoding of the parameter value. 使用 HTTP GET，叫用 Web 服務方法會遵循相同的任何其他 Web 互動的指導方針。The use of HTTP GET for invoking the Web service method follows the same guidelines for any other Web interaction. HTTP GET 應該只針對作業公開任何機密資料的位置以及使用伺服器的動作不能有副作用。HTTP GET should be used only for operations where no sensitive data is exposed and when the server action does not have side effects. > [!IMPORTANT] > 設定屬性`true`可能會造成安全性風險，您的應用程式，如果您正在使用機密資料或交易。Setting the property to `true` might pose a security risk for your application if you are working with sensitive data or transactions. 在 GET 要求訊息由瀏覽器編碼成 URL，因此遭到竄改的輕鬆目標。In GET requests, the message is encoded by the browser into the URL and is therefore an easier target for tampering. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何套用與 Web 方法屬性設定為`true`。The following example shows how to apply to a Web method with the property set to `true`. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool XmlSerializeString { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.XmlSerializeString : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否將所有傳回型別 (包含字串型別) 序列化為 XML。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether all return types are serialized as XML, which includes string types.

value.span: 如果要將所有傳回型別序列化為 XML 則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if all return types are serialized as XML; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為`false`，所有傳回型別會序列化為 XML，除了解譯為 XML 標記的字串。When this property is set to `false`, all return types are serialized as XML, except string, which is interpreted as XML markup. 如果值為`false`，因此如果的傳回型別是字串，而且如果字串不包含對應至格式正確的 XML 文件的 XML 標記，成功的回呼函式會叫用但所產生的序列化的字串`null`.If the value is `false`, and if the return type is a string, and if the string does not contain XML markup that corresponds to a well-formed XML document, the succeeded callback function will be invoked but the resulting serialized string will be `null`. 值時，會忽略屬性設定為`Json`。The value of is ignored when the property is set to `Json`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何套用與 Web 方法屬性設定為`true`。The following example shows how to apply to a Web method with the property set to `true`. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
